stretches.name: Wrist Flexors Stretch
stretches.description: Extend arms in front, palms away. Press down on fingers to stretch wrist flexors.

stretches.name: Arm Swings
stretches.description: Swing arms forward and backward in a controlled motion.

stretches.name: Neck Circles
stretches.description: Rotate head in full circles, chin towards shoulder and back.

stretches.name: Spinal Twists
stretches.description: Sit, twist upper body to one side, hold. Switch sides.
stretches.advice: Keep spine straight, avoid forcing twist.

stretches.name: Side-to-Side Hips Shift
stretches.description: Shift hips from side to side, knees slightly bent.

stretches.name: Tricep Stretch
stretches.description: Raise one arm overhead, bend elbow. Press gently on elbow.
